message: Let's start with a fair split. What do you think?
You can do better than that!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but not too much!
You're getting closer, but I want more!
You're getting close to the minimum, take it or leave it!
You're not getting the best deal, trust me!
I'm not afraid to walk away, meet me in the middle!
You're getting desperate, I'm not backing down!
This is my final offer, take it or we'll both walk away!
I'm taking what's mine, you're getting the scraps!
Fine, we'll go back to the original proposal. Take it or leave it!
